hero.badge: Open Source Â· Adaptive Â· Emergent
hero.title: Portable AI Agent Runtime for Adaptive & Emergent Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Build adaptive, emergent AI agents with memory, tools, and agency. TypeScript runtime featuring GMI roles, multi-agent orchestration, and enterprise guardrails.

technicalHighlights.title: Streaming-first runtime
technicalHighlights.detail: Token-level delivery across personas, guardrails, and channels.

technicalHighlights.title: Deterministic orchestration
technicalHighlights.detail: Parallel GMIs with auditable routing, approvals, and budgets.

technicalHighlights.title: Zero-copy memory fabric
technicalHighlights.detail: Vector, episodic, and working memory stitched together for recall.

technicalHighlights.title: Portable intelligence capsules
technicalHighlights.detail: Export full AgentOS instances as Markdown or JSON and ingest anywhere.

features.sectionSubtitle: Production-grade infrastructure for building, deploying, and scaling AI agents

multiAgent.title: Emergent Multi-Agent Coordination
multiAgent.description: Spawn researcher, analyst, critic, and executor personas from a single goal. Shared context, budgets, and approvals keep every branch in sync.

toolPacks.title: Tool & Guardrail Packs
toolPacks.description: Ship opinionated extensions for search, vision, code execution, or custom APIs with built-in permissions and retries.

language.title: Language & Translation
language.description: Auto-detect locale and tone per surface. Personas stay fluent across voice, chat, and docs with translation providers of your choice.

storage.title: Storage & Deployment
storage.description: Switch between PostgreSQL, better-sqlite3, sql.js, or your own data layers. Every agent step is synced and replayable.

workbench.title: Local-First Workbench
workbench.description: Prototype entire agencies in-browser with persisted SQL, timeline scrubbers, and a built-in marketplace of personas.
workbench.bullet2: Sync artifacts back to the cloud
workbench.bullet3: Export full agencies as Markdown/JSON bundles

marketplace.description: Share, buy, and sell your AgentOS agencies. We'll handle CI/CD, infrastructure, payouts, and compliance so you can focus on adaptive, emergent, permanent intelligence.

caseStudies.description: Real-world AgentOS implementations and production deployments

footer.tagline: TypeScript runtime for adaptive AI agents by Frame.dev

cta.title: Ready to Build Adaptive AI Agents?
cta.description: Join developers building the next generation of intelligent systems with AgentOS.

productCards.title: Core Capabilities
productCards.subtitle: Enterprise-grade features to build, scale, and ship intelligent AI agents

adaptive.title: Adaptive Intelligence
adaptive.description: Real-time learning and context-aware decision-making that evolves with every interaction

distributed.title: Distributed Cognition
distributed.description: Parallel processing across multiple agents with seamless coordination and load balancing

memory.title: Persistent Memory
memory.description: Boundless storage with instant recall via advanced vector embeddings and semantic search

streaming.title: Real-time Streaming
streaming.description: Ultra-low latency event architecture with WebSocket support and 99.99% uptime

enterprise.title: Enterprise Ready Features
enterprise.subtitle: Building blocks of enterprise-grade infrastructure, each layer adding security and scale

fullyImplemented.title: Fully Implemented
fullyImplemented.description: GDPR compliance, PII redaction, and core security features are production-ready

inProgress.title: In Progress
inProgress.description: SOC2 Type II certification underway, expected completion Q2 2024

enterpriseSupport.title: Enterprise Support
enterpriseSupport.description: 24/7 support with vca.chat integration and dedicated success managers

multiAgent.subtitle: Researcher, Analyst, Creator, Critic, Executor stream insights in parallel

steps: Each agent proposes solution with confidence score
